languages.text: "Я не в праве отдать тебе тех, кто доверил мне свою судьбу... но я могу отдать взамен них себя. За их ошибку — забери мою жизнь".
"I am not at liberty to hand over those who have entrusted their lives to me... but I can offer myself in exchange. For their mistake, take my life."
languages.original_text: "Я не в праве отдать тебе тех, кто доверил мне свою судьбу... но я могу отдать взамен них себя. За их ошибку — забери мою жизнь".

traits.locale_text: "I am not at liberty to hand over those who have entrusted their lives to me... but I can offer myself in exchange. For their mistake, take my life."
"I am not at liberty to hand over those who have entrusted their lives to me... but I can offer myself in exchange. For their mistake, take my life."
"I am not at liberty to hand over those who have entrusted their lives to me... but I can offer myself in exchange. For their mistake, take my life."
"I am not at liberty to hand over those who have entrusted their lives to me... but I can offer myself in exchange. For their mistake, take my life."

languages.text: “那些人把他们的生命托付给了我，我无权夺走他们的性命……不过，我可以把我自己的生命献给你。原谅他们的错误，取走我的生命吧。”
languages.original_text: "I am not at liberty to hand over those who have entrusted their lives to me... but I can offer myself in exchange. For their mistake, take my life."

traits.locale_text: “那些人把他们的生命托付给了我，我无权夺走他们的性命……不过，我可以把我自己的生命献给你。原谅他们的错误，取走我的生命吧。”

languages.text: «No tengo derecho a entregarte a quienes me han confiado sus vidas... pero sí puedo ofrecerme a cambio. Quédate mi vida como pago por su error».
languages.original_text: "I am not at liberty to hand over those who have entrusted their lives to me... but I can offer myself in exchange. For their mistake, take my life."

traits.locale_text: «No tengo derecho a entregarte a quienes me han confiado sus vidas... pero sí puedo ofrecerme a cambio. Quédate mi vida como pago por su error».

languages.text: 「{mf|俺|私}に命を預けてくれた者たちを引き渡す自由は{mf|俺|私}にはない…だが、{mf|俺|私}を引き換えに差し出すことはできる。{mf|俺|私}の命をもって、彼らの誤ちの対価とするがいい」
languages.original_text: "I am not at liberty to hand over those who have entrusted their lives to me... but I can offer myself in exchange. For their mistake, take my life."

traits.locale_text: 「{mf|俺|私}に命を預けてくれた者たちを引き渡す自由は{mf|俺|私}にはない…だが、{mf|俺|私}を引き換えに差し出すことはできる。{mf|俺|私}の命をもって、彼らの誤ちの対価とするがいい」

languages.text: « Il ne m'appartient pas de vous livrer ceux qui m'ont confié leur vie... mais en échange, je peux vous offrir la mienne. Si cela peut racheter leur erreur, tuez-moi. »
languages.original_text: "I am not at liberty to hand over those who have entrusted their lives to me... but I can offer myself in exchange. For their mistake, take my life."

traits.locale_text: « Il ne m'appartient pas de vous livrer ceux qui m'ont confié leur vie... mais en échange, je peux vous offrir la mienne. Si cela peut racheter leur erreur, tuez-moi. »

languages.text: "Ich darf jene, deren Leben mir anvertraut wurden, nicht aushändigen ... doch ich kann mich selbst im Tausch anbieten. Nehmt für ihren Fehler mein Leben."
languages.original_text: "I am not at liberty to hand over those who have entrusted their lives to me... but I can offer myself in exchange. For their mistake, take my life."

traits.locale_text: "Ich darf jene, deren Leben mir anvertraut wurden, nicht aushändigen ... doch ich kann mich selbst im Tausch anbieten. Nehmt für ihren Fehler mein Leben."

languages.text: "Hayatlarını bana emanet edenlerin canlarını başkalarına vermek gibi bir ayrıcalığım yok ancak... Karşılığında kendimi sunabilirim. Onların hataları için benim canımı al."
languages.original_text: "I am not at liberty to hand over those who have entrusted their lives to me... but I can offer myself in exchange. For their mistake, take my life."

traits.locale_text: "Hayatlarını bana emanet edenlerin canlarını başkalarına vermek gibi bir ayrıcalığım yok ancak... Karşılığında kendimi sunabilirim. Onların hataları için benim canımı al."
